H0.text: Who won the best actress Oscar at the 2013 ceremony. Jennifer Garner

H1.text: Who won the best actress Oscar at the 2013 ceremony. Charlize Theron

H2.text: Who won the best actress Oscar at the 2013 ceremony. Marion Cotillard

H3.text: Who won the best actress Oscar at the 2013 ceremony. JLaw

A4.text: She won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her portrayal of French singer Édith Piaf in La Vie en Rose (2007).

A5.text: At the Academy Awards, she won Best Actress, becoming the first woman and second person (after Adrien Brody in The Pianist six years earlier) to win both a César and an Oscar for the same performance.

A6.text: At age 22, Best Actress winner Jennifer Lawrence became the second-youngest winner in that category.
